page.title: 19SCHOOLS-KNAPHILL/ST JOHNS
page.content:
Knaphill school has 225 children on roll. It's 104 years old and has 17 staff. St.Hugh of Lincoln has 132 children on roll. It is 8 years old and has 14 staff. St.Johns school has 395 children on roll. It's 13 years old with 19 staff. Winston Churchill is a Secondary school and has 1200 on roll. There are 90 staff members and it is 14 years old. The Hermitage school has 221 children. It has 15 staff and is 23 years old. The Hermitage first school has 226 on roll. It is 18 years old with 15 staff. Secondary schools have pupils aged 12-16, Middle schools 8-12, and First schools 5-8.
REPORTER CHARLOTTE HOBBS AGED 10
